metadata.title: CVE-2017-9374 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Memory leak in QEMU (aka Quick Emulator), when built with USB EHCI Emulation support, allows local guest OS privileged users to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) by repeatedly hot-unplugging the device.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.10+dfsg-0ubuntu1').
